__e: When you see movies about the 50's everybody thinks it was about Buddy Holly and Ritchie Valens and stuff like that, but people that I knew in the 50's, I mean, they had a record collection.
I didn't know anybody who had a Buddy Holly record.
Dewey, you'll be fine, or my name's not Buddy Holly.
Buddy, this shouldn't be too difficult for you.
So please if you like me a little bit don't tell them, please!
Wow, Buddy's not gonna have much to work with here.
